rescuecore2.worldmodel

Interface Property

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProperty, BooleanProperty, DoubleProperty, EdgeListProperty, EntityRefListProperty, EntityRefProperty, IntArrayProperty, IntProperty, Point2DProperty

    public interface Property
    Interface for the properties that make up an entity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Property copy()
      Create a copy of this property.
      java.lang.String getURN()
      Get the urn of this property.
      java.lang.Object getValue()
      Get the value of this property.
      boolean isDefined()
      Does this property have a defined value?

      Read this property from a stream.
      void takeValue(Property other)
      Take on the value of another property.
      void undefine()
      Undefine the value of this property.
      void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Write this property to a stream.

    • Method Detail

      • getURN

        java.lang.String getURN()
        Get the urn of this property.
        Returns:
        The urn of this property.

      • isDefined

        boolean isDefined()
        Does this property have a defined value?
        Returns:
        True if a value has been set for this property, false otherwise.

      • undefine

        void undefine()
        Undefine the value of this property. Future calls to isDefined() will return false.

      • takeValue

        void takeValue(Property other)
        Take on the value of another property.
        Parameters:
        other - The other property to inspect.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the other property is the wrong type.

      • write

        void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Write this property to a stream.
        Parameters:
        out - The stream to write to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the write fails.

      • read

        void read(java.io.InputStream in)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Read this property from a stream.
        Parameters:
        in - The stream to read from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the read fails.

      • getValue

        java.lang.Object getValue()
        Get the value of this property. If the property is undefined then the return value should be null.
        Returns:
        The value of this property.

      • copy

        Property copy()
        Create a copy of this property.
        Returns:
        A copy of this property.
